By Infernus on Saturday, January 7, 2006 - 10:22 pm:

Actually, if you do get it now, after the fact, it would be good to know. I never have heard of anyone getting them out of order, and actually, I've never heard of anyone other than myself getting the Vizley upgrade.

And always remember when doing this:

"Don't be discouraged if you don't get this on your first attempt. If you've gone every chance you had for about a year, go somewhere else, completely break all rules I mention, and start there again.

By Apocalypse on Sunday, January 8, 2006 - 08:53 am:

By Scorpio Maurus on Friday, July 28, 2006 - 04:40 am:

Actually I got them out of order this last time I played for sure. The first few saves I don't know because I wasn't paying attention but this time I know I got them out of order. I went to Togle then Vizley then Torble. Vizley is easy I think but takes longer for that convo between Talt and Laurier. Did anyone else ever notice that they call him HIM/HIS/HE for the whole game but after the shop upgrade in Vizley there is a part where Laurier calls him She? It's sort of bizarre I think though I always thought he was a she anyway because of that super manly pink smock and headband but who knows.

By AlmostUnsane on Sunday, January 11, 2009 - 11:24 am:

A couple (late) notes from my attempt to get this upgrade.

I got the upgrade before beating Xevion (I'm not sure exactly where I am in the story, but the next step to advance it is to beat the Official A-rank tourney). However, about a week or two later, I went back and talked to Chiho...and got the scene with Philia. After that, the shop un-upgraded. Chiho went back to her old pose, and the new items went away.

I didn't try to regain it (I'd saved a couple weeks prior, so I decided to just load and not risk losing it for good), but something to keep an eye out for.
